entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
